document.discussion_title: Padres Bullpen Implodes Again in Loss
document.topic_text: 7 San Diego Monday 25th April, 2016 SAN DIEGO, CALIFORNIA - APRIL 24: Aledmys Diaz #36 of the St. Louis Cardinals, is congratulated by Matt Carpenter #13, left, and Kolten Wong #16 after hitting a solo home run during the sixth inning of a baseball game against the San Diego Padres at PETCO Park on April 24, 2016 in San Diego, California. (Photo by Denis Poroy/Getty Images)...

(Photo by Denis Poroy/Getty Images)...
